# Sneaky Beaky Steve
[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/subscribe-white.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/eliesercapillar/)
[![X](https://img.shields.io/badge/subscribe-white.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://x.com/eliesercapillar)

<img src="./Docs/cover.png"/>

## About
Sneaky Beaky Steve is a simple 2D stealth game made in Unity. 

_Steve's goal is to get through the work week without being seen by his coworkers!_

Try it now on my [_itch.io page!_](https://eliesercapillar.itch.io/)
